title.rendered: LG XBOOM Go, the perfect powerful portable speakers for this summer

content.rendered:
The Korean company boasts an extraordinary catalog of Bluetooth speakers, with models of all kinds to meet your needs. But today we want to talk to you about the LG XBOOM Go PL7 and PL5two models that will meet the mark if you are looking for a waterproof model to take it everywhere.

Don’t worry about anything, just enjoy the music

LG has achieved what it calls Absolute Sound with its new LG XBOOM Go family. Your weapons? An powerful and distortion-free soundscape no matter how much you turn up the volume, a few heavy bass with side woofers for deep, clear sound, plus a sound quality thanks to Meridian DSP.

In addition, LG knows perfectly well the type of use that is given to this type of Bluetooth speakers. The idea is to be able to take them to the beach, camping, to the pool… Environments in which you can suffer all kinds of mishaps. Without a doubt, perfect Bluetooth speakers to enjoy in company

And what better way than to avoid unnecessary scares than to provide the XBOOM Go range with a design according to your needs. For this reason, PL7 and PL5 loudspeakers feature a rounded design with rubber finishes that improve grip, in addition to absorbing the impacts and fortuitous falls that it may suffer to add extra resistance.

To this must be added waterproof through its IPX5 certification to ensure that you can continue enjoying your favorite songs, even if these Bluetooth speakers get wet.

The icing on the cake is put by the led lights that incorporates this line of loudspeakers and that light up to the rhythm of the music to create a very attractive visual landscape. Without a doubt, two resistant speakers to get the most out of this summer. More, seeing the incredible sound offered by the LG XBOOM Go PL7 and PL5.

Meridian sound to live an incomparable experience

We have told you before get absolute sound It was the goal of the company. And it is that, despite its restrained dimensions, the LG XBOOM Go family boasts a soundscape beyond any doubt.

For it, the LG XBOOM Go PL7 and PL5 offer powerful sound without distortion, even if you turn up the volume to the maximum. Squeeze the 30W of power from the PL7, or the 20W from the PL5 thanks to its Sound Boost technology that increases the power of the sound and extends its field up to 200 meters.

In addition, this family of speakers offers intense bass thanks to its double passive radiator. Dual Action Bass. Two woofers placed on the sides to deliver powerful rhythms with pure and deep bass.

And, as expected, they boast of the great sound quality thanks to Meridian DSP (Digital Signal Processing). We are talking about the music giant’s signal processing system to achieve absolute control. With this, the sound is reproduced clear and without distortion, in addition to being compatible with the main formats, such as AAC or BSC.

In case you don’t know Meridian, from one of the most important companies in the sound sector and which, since it was founded in 1977, has been pushing boundaries, changing standards and designing products with exquisite sound. Pioneers of High-Resolution Audio and masters of Digital Signal Processing (DSP), Meridian is a guarantee of success. And for this reason the best LG speakers are adjusted by this company.

And eye, what you can pair up to 100 LG XBOOM Go to multiply its power and create a unique environment, with powerful sound, intense bass and better sound quality. The best of all? That you can press the play button for two seconds to activate Google Assistant or Siri.

Undoubtedly, a complete family of speakers to enjoy absolute sound in company. Although both models offer all these technologies, there are some differences that are worth noting. With respect to LG XBOOM Go PL7, we are facing the most complete speaker thanks to its 30 W of power and a range of 24 hours. Without a doubt, a very complete and perfect model for your parties.

Although if you prefer a slightly more compact model, the LG XBOOM Go PL5 is perfect for you. In this case we find a waterproof speaker that offers 20 W of power and up to 18 hours of autonomy.
